price: Nuko arinyabya asanga ab’iwe, azana inyana ibyibushye (inyama z’inyana yokeje).
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
